verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
He looked for a city
and lived in a tent
A pilgrim to glory
right onward he went

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
God's promise his solace
so royal his birth
no wonder he sought
not the glories of earth

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Home! Home!
Home sweet home
a welcome from Jesus
awaits us at Home

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
He looked for a city
his God should prepare
no mansion on earth
could he covet or share

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
for had not God told him
that royal abode
awaited His pilgrims
who kept to the road

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
He looked for a city
If sometimes he sighed
To be trudging the road
all earth's glory denied

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
The thought of that city
changed sighing to song
For the road might be rough
but it could not be long

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
He looked for a city
his hope Lord we share
And know that bright city
Which Thou dost prepare

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
We'll dwell in forever
since willing to be
Just pilgrims with Jesus
Our roof a tent tree
